Package pl.put.poznan.transformer.logic.decorators

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CapitalizeDecorator
    The function capitalizes the first letter of each word while leaving the remaining letters in lowercase.
    EliminateRepetitionDecorator
    Function removes adjacent repeated characters in the input text Function is not case-sensitive Parameters: input(String) text provided by user Returns: input(String) transformed input
    InverseDecorator
    Function reverses the order of characters in the input text while preserving the case of letters at their original positions.
    LowerDecorator
    The function changes the case of letters to lowercase.
    NumbererDecorator
    The function converts numerical values into their corresponding word representations.
    ShortCutterDecorator
    Function shortens selected phrases Phrases and shortcuts are stored using HashMap Function is not case-sensitive Parameters: input(String) text provided by user Returns: input(String) transformed input
    ShortExtenderDecorator
    Function extends shortcuts, provided by user Phrases and shortcuts are stored using HashMap Function is case-sensitive(on the first position) Parameters: input(String) text provided by user Returns: input(String) transformed input
    UpperDecorator
    The function changes the case of letters to uppercase.
